attributes.action: DISMISS ANY MP, GUILTY OF EXAGGERATING AN EXPENSE CLAIM, REGARDLESS OF AMOUNT.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the private sector, employees guilty of exaggerating are generally sacked. This should be applied to any MP claiming for items not essential to their job. There are alternatives, such as hotels and purpose built accomodation blocks, that would dispense with this outrageous abuse of the system.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
